remarks: Alternate expression for the proper substitution into a class, without referencing substitution into a wff.  Note that ` x ` can be free in ` B ` but cannot occur in ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2013.)
statement:
csb2 $p |- [_ A / x ]_ B = { y | E. x ( x = A /\ y e. B ) } $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
